incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in expressing myself through my words
incontinence.question: Did I lose self-control in expressing myself through my words, using language that was unbecoming or hurtful to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with crude language that offended their dignity
incontinence.question: Did I lose self-control in my conversations with others, speaking to them with crude language that offended their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
perhaps within social gatherings or dinner parties that I regularly attend
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, perhaps within social gatherings or dinner parties that I regularly attend?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing private family matters, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I entertained myself by sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

pride.question: Did I unnecessarily take on a responsibility, such as work or chores, on Sunday when it otherwise could be avoided?
pride.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
